template.name: gc-pandas-show-all
template.value: pd.set_option('display.max_rows', 500) # To see all rows pd.set_option('display.max_columns', 500) # To see all columns pd.set_option('display.width', 1000)
template.description: pandas show all rows and columns

template.name: gc-pandas-iterate-rows
template.value: for row_idx,row in df.iterrows(): print("row number:" , row_idx," content: ", row["field"])
